title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
01:56 <tekzilla> sorry i missed you, thanks for the info  
02:01 <tekzilla> a thing i just noticed about the run-shellscript: instead of using $3 $4 $5.. when calling the jar, you could just shift the first two args and then use "$@"  
02:17 <@cjdelisl1> ahh good thinking, thanks  
08:05 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:32 <tekzilla> has quit  
08:34 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <sdumitriu> has quit  
09:24 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
10:53 <rrodriguez> has quit  
10:58 <+Denis> Hi devs, anyone knows how to format decimal numbers properly in velocity ? Any workaround for XWIKI-6813 ?  
11:00 <+Denis> xwikibot seems sleeping... http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6813  
11:28 <+sburjan> guys, it seems that enabling multilingual in wiki and putting some languages in the Languages field in admin app, does not bring the buttons to switch in the top right side. I am going to report this  
11:36 <Alex\_\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:41 <Alex\_\_\_> Hallo everyone. I can't get the LDAP Authentication of the XWiki running. I use the ldap tools from the extension page.  If i trigger the sync job i get the following error in the log http://pastebin.com/cf03gfXQ. How can I fix this?  
11:52 <lucaa> has quit  
12:13 <mflorea> has quit  
12:18 <Alex\_\_\_> has quit  
12:25 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:04 <+sburjan> shouldn't we use the jira macro for http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap ? it would show better the progress we make (fixed issues are crosslined + we have links to the issues)  
13:25 <mflorea> has quit  
14:01 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <silviar> has quit  
14:30 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
14:43 <Alex\_\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <Alex\_\_\_> Hello again. To my question from [11:41]: I'm now able to sync with LDAP with the username and passwort matching not as the placeholders {0} and {1} but with both typed in directly. Is there any idea what I did wrong and how to use these placeholders?  
15:11 <rrodriguez> has quit  
15:17 <silviar> has quit  
15:20 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
15:39 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:40 <+lucaa> hi guys, I just noticed that we don't have a page on xwiki.org with a list of all means to contact the community in one place  
15:41 <+lucaa> everytime I need to guide people about how to communicate with the community i need to give them 2 links, one to the mailing lists, another one to the IRC and jabber  
15:41 <+lucaa> it would be great to have it in a single place  
15:41 <+lucaa> is there an idea box for the improvement of xwiki.org where I can add this?  
15:57 <lucaa> has quit  
16:16 <silviar> Hi Anca! It's in the plan to improve xwiki.org (see the discussion Caty started on the Mailing Lists)  
16:17 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
16:17 <silviar> For a more rapid fix you could list the page here http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DocumentationToDo and me or Sorin are going to look at it and improve the pages.  
16:17 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
16:26 <silviar> has quit  
16:38 <Alex\_\_\_> has quit  
17:13 <fmancinelli> has quit  
17:35 <Denis> has quit  
17:36 <sburjan`> has quit  
17:36 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
17:36 <sburjan> has quit  
17:41 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:01 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:28 <sburjan`> has quit  
18:28 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
18:53 <mflorea> has quit  
19:38 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
19:43 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
20:15 <Ruudjah> has joined #xwiki  
20:15 <Ruudjah> hi  
20:15 <sburjan`> has quit  
20:18 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
20:22 <Ruudjah> I've searched a bit, but could not find  
20:23 <Ruudjah> I'm looking to (existent/DIY) convert wiki pages into i18n files  
20:23 <@sdumitriu> Hi Ruudjah  
20:23 <Ruudjah> it would involve reading the wiki page, extracting i18n name and introduction, and generate i18n java files from that  
20:24 <@sdumitriu> WDYM? ApplicationResources.properties files?  
20:24 <Ruudjah> yes  
20:24 <Ruudjah> the actual java files no problem, i can write such code by hand (must be domain specific anyways)  
20:24 <Ruudjah> I wonder though if there is a unified mechanism to distill description from wiki page  
20:25 <sburjan`> has quit  
20:25 <Ruudjah> e.g. what google maps does with wikipedia  
20:25 <Ruudjah> in gmaps, you can enable wikipedia layer then have icons with balloons filled with "leader" or "introduction"  
20:25 <@sdumitriu> Nothing that I know of, but would be possible with some scripting  
20:26 <Ruudjah> e.g. there' s no defined way of specifying an intro/leadin for a wiki page?  
20:26 <@sdumitriu> Depends where you want to put the script, in the wiki or as an external service getting the wiki content via REST and the post processing it  
20:26 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
20:26 <Ruudjah> script must run precompiletime in my app  
20:27 <Ruudjah> so I guess that would be extenral  
20:32 <Ruudjah> e.g. assume the leadin is untill the first paragraph  
21:47 <lucaa> has quit  
22:31 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
22:51 <pgmjsd> has quit  
23:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

23:36 <abusenius> has quit
